ygData.subject: Re: Re: New Survey!
ygData.msgSnippet: Twinking is okay to a certain extent, but a level 1 should not have full steel and a ghoulbane.  What s the point of even playing the character? Isnt half the
ygData.messageBody:
Twinking is okay to a certain extent, but a level 1 should not have full
steel and a ghoulbane. What's the point of even playing the character?
Isnt half the fun getting some of the items yourself? I can understand and
have no problem with some twinking.. maybe some bronze and a pretty good
weapon and shield, but that's just dumb.

-----Original Message-----
From: Shane Bole <shane0009@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, August 02, 1999 10:10 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: New Survey!


>From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
>
>whats wrong with twinking? =)
>when my cleric decided to stop living he felt like he should give his
>equipment to his brother before he dies
>
